3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 78 Wilder Street, a sun-filled 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo located in the heart of Glen Park village. This top floor residence offers a modern and convenient lifestyle with a secure entrance through a gated entryway. As you enter, you'll be greeted by an open and inviting living space with a vaulted ceiling, allowing natural light to illuminate the interior. The open kitchen has been tastefully remodeled and seamlessly flows into the living room, creating a perfect space for entertaining. The primary bedroom features an en-suite bathroom while the two additional bedrooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom for added convenience & privacy. Additional features include a 1-car parking garage with extra storage, wide-plank walnut floors, radiant floor heating, tankless water heater, in-unit w/d and a private side deck. This location is a commuter's delight with close proximity to the BART station, convenient freeway access and a stone throw from Canyon market and other locals favorites.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on perhaps the best street in Glen Park this fabulous view home offers the additional value of a super comfortable charming legal lower unit. Upper level features gorgeous hardwood floors, period fireplace, a big eat in kitchen with large skylight. All rooms are good sized bright and the floor plan is well designed. Wonderful bay views as this home is high up but convenient to all Glen Park has to offer. The delightful lower level unit is near perfect with built in bed, large living room & kitchen. Separate entrance opening to the serene patio/garden with great hot tub. Rear patio, garage parking and plenty of storage complete the package making this the one not to miss. Glen Park at its BEST!
Confidential Remarks: Full disclosure package available contact howard ag howard@vanguardsf.com or 415-730-6382 ----OFFERS THURSDAY MARCH 21ST - 4PM-----

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Price Improvement - Looking for the ultimate city living experience? Look no further! This stunning home is move-in ready and boasts an impressive list of features that will make your life easier and more enjoyable. The kitchen is a chef's dream come true, with a Thermador stove and outdoor gas grill, perfect for cooking up a storm. The back patio is the ideal place to relax and entertain guests, surrounded by a beautiful south facing view. The bedrooms are spacious and have a stunning south facing view, allowing you to start each day with a burst of natural light. Whether you are into yoga or just looking for a quiet space to meditate, the yoga studio is the perfect place to stretch and find your inner peace. This home is conveniently located in the heart of Glen Park, within walking distance to Glen Park Village, where you will find a variety of shopping, dining and entertainment options. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a piece of the city!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the best of College Hill living in this charming Marina-style home at 44 College Avenue. Architectural details include French doors, crown molding, picture rails, hardwood floors, and a beautiful bay window. With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this home has a great flow and floorplan. Natural light floods the space, making it feel bright and welcoming. The main level is the heart of the home, featuring a spacious living room, formal dining room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, and sunroom/office. Step out onto the deck from the sunroom and enjoy Southern views of the neighborhood and the impressive spires of St. John the Evangelist Church. The garden level has a guest room, bathroom, laundry room, workshop, and large walk-in mudroom/closet offering plenty of storage and functionality. The travertine patio + lush garden are perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying your own private sanctuary. When you're ready to explore, simply cross the street to swing + visit the beautiful neighborhood garden created by volunteers that beautify the Bernal Cut, a delightful promenade of plantings + murals. Enjoy business along Mission St, Bernal's Cortland Ave + Glen Park Village
Confidential Remarks: Received 4 offers. No preemptive offers per seller instruction. Garden level is additional 745 square feet, may not be warranted. Pre-Escrow #3652300115 with Barbara Jimenez of Chicago Title. Questions? Email BOTH Sabrina Gee-Shin AND Charles Loiacono.
Directions to Property: College is a curved street. St. Mary's & Mission S

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 564 Chenery, a turn-key detached single-family home in the highly desirable Glen Park neighborhood. This home is located just a couple blocks away from the amazing restaurants and shops in Glen Park Village! Upon entering the home you'll be delighted by the beautifully landscaped front yard. The private, enclosed space is perfect for enjoying the outdoors. Walking right up to the main level of the home is the living room, kitchen, dining room, primary bed and full bath. All the rooms up here get great natural light! The kitchen comes with all new high end stainless steel Bosch appliances, soft close cabinetry, and modern backsplash. On the lower level there are two more bedrooms, a full bath, and a family room with its own entrance. Other updates include a newer roof, new floors, and fresh paint throughout. A detached garage completes this home. Perfect location, with a 89 walk score and yet just minutes from the 280 and 101 freeways as well as Glen Park Bart station and tech shuttles. www.564CheneryStreet.com
Confidential Remarks: Motivated sellers, bring us an offer! Sellers are doing a 1031 exchange at no additional cost or liability to Buyer. Please use CAR contract. Supra lockbox is located in the back of the property on the stair railing.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: The street-side garden and facade confirm that you have arrived at a very special home. From the porch, you enter a bright living room with hardwood floors, wainscoting and wall sconces. The dining room, located between the living room and spacious kitchen, is ideal for intimate dinner parties or casual entertaining. The kitchen has a gas stove and ample cabnetry and counter space; truly an added pleasure for the home chef. An cozy family room nook, adjacent to the kitchen, overlooks an award-winning garden and offers access to a sunny deck. Off the kitchen are the comfortable bedroom and bathroom with extra storage. Washer /dryer and additional storage complete the home.

Potential for fast track condo conversion.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 45 Chilton Ave offers the best of every world: A spacious, light-filled two-level, 4-bedroom + office home that is thoughtfully renovated for comfortable modern living and memorable entertaining with lush views of the surrounding greenery or backyard from almost every room. Located on the coveted tree-lined Chilton Avenue cul-de-sac just off the serene Glen Park Greenway, the home enjoys all the benefits from its central Glen Park location: a few minutes walk to Glen Canyon Park, Glen Park Village's many amenities, and easy access to 101, 280, BART and an array of transit options. Do not be deterred by the property's proximity to Bosworth; the Greenway, trees and cul-de-sac shelter the property from any street noise.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow is opened with jfogarty@firstam.com. All buyers to use the most current 8-page SFAR contract. If needed, one will be provided. *All info herein is not guaranteed. Public Remarks: Breathtaking views that words cannot describe! Tucked in the Glen Park area, this remarkable opportunity has the most spectacular views of Downtown San Francisco, the San Francisco Bay, the Bay Bridge, and so much more! Enjoy the City Lights from the comfort of your living room and bedrooms with their expansive windows, or while drinking your warm morning coffee on your open, private patio. Featuring 2 beds, 2 baths, laundry room, walk in closet, sky lights for the extra natural lighting, an addition den/office area, and usable backyard space on flat ground. This pristine location and once in a lifetime possibility is ready to make yours today!
Showing Instruction: Call First,Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 391 Chenery St; a 3br/2ba single family home nestled in the highly desirable neighborhood of Glen Park. This handsome residence offers the perfect blend of classic charm and modern elegance. The main level boasts 2 bedrooms and a full bath. The living room is adorned with a charming fireplace, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere to gather and relax. The formal dining room, strategically placed between the kitchen and living room, enhances the flow of the home and provides an ideal space for entertaining guests. Abundant natural light bathes the interior, showcasing the hardwood floors and highlighting the tall ceilings. From the kitchen and dining area, sweeping views of the surrounding hills and cityscape can be seen. On the lower level, a spacious primary suite awaits. This private sanctuary features an office area, generous walk-in closet a spa-like bathroom and deck overlooking private yard offering a retreat within your own home. Step outside to discover a garden oasis that provides a serene and secluded space to unwind. A one car garage and laundry room complete this enchanting home. Convenance is at your fingertips with easy access to public transportation, the Bart station, Glen Park Canyon Recreation Center and Glen Park Village.
Confidential Remarks: Call listing agent for code. Buyer to verify square footage; tax records do not reflect expansion. Offers, if any, will be reviewed Monday April 22 at 12pm. Disclosures: https://app.disclosures.io/link/391-Chenery-Street-z5l0eftm

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming, period, south-facing, home swimming in abundant natural light. Same family for almost 60 years raised 3 kids. Newly painted fresh facade and original terrazzo stairs. Formal entry with coat closet leading to the spacious living room with recessed lighting, fireplace, large windows, original decorative molding, and original parquet floors. Formal dining room. Kitchen suite with full-height cabinets, breakfast area with skylight, second skylight, and sun-drenched atrium. Airy hallway with third skylight, and linen closet. Two large bedrooms at rear overlooking expansive backyard and garden through double-pane windows. Bathroom with separate stall shower, and soaking bathtub, new vanity, and toto toilet. Internal stairs connect lower level with bonus/family room/home office/home gym overlooking backyard. Large 2+ car garage with great expansion potential plus additional storage space. Expansive, and sun-drenched, flat backyard fully-fenced with mature fruit trees and flowering plants. ADU? Intimate, quiet Slow street great proximity to Glen Park village/BART/Park (10 minute walk), Balboa Park/BART, Ocean Ave including Whole Foods, J-Church, 280/101. Mission Terrace is a hidden gem.
Confidential Remarks: Please text Jamie for private showings. Great expansion potential within already existing lower level (approx 1165 sq ft at garage level). Large backyard almost exactly the same size as the home. Sellers added dry rain drain in backyard, double-pane windows in bedrooms, recessed lighting in living room, GFCI breaker, new water heater in 2023. Property next door with same footprint but smaller backyard sold last year for $1,330,000. Home and pest inspections completed, pest report will be added to disclosures June 17. Escrow already opened with Fidelity National Title (Bethe Battalio) and owners kindly request to keep it with FNT due to work on successor trust title work completed (no court confirmation).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 36 Berkeley Way, a rarely-available mid-century single-family home in the heart of Diamond Heights! This spacious residence boasts 5 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, spread over 2,185 square feet of living space. Luxuriate in the abundant natural light that bathes the home in warmth and brightness. The main level greets you with a generously-sized south-facing living area, perfect for entertaining guests or unwinding with family. The large primary suite is a retreat unto itself, offering a private oasis to relax and rejuvenate. Wake up to inspiring Bay Views from the private balcony. The home is the epitome of convenience and functionality, featuring 4 bedrooms on the upper level, with a lower level home office or guest suite on main level. Guest Suite has direct access to the covered backyard patio for year round outdoor relaxation. The 2-car garage and ample street parking makes for a stress-free visit for your loved ones. Boasting tremendous potential, this property presents a canvas ready for your personal touch and creative vision. Whether you're looking to customize your dream home or capitalize on an incredible investment opportunity, this residence offers endless possibilities. Great location convenient to shopping, freeway, dogwalking, Glen Park BART, and much more!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 70 Hiliritas Avenue, your new home in San Francisco's beautiful Glen Park neighborhood! This semi-fixer upper features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms spread across 2,160 square feet, offering a great layout for your future dream home. The spacious dining and living areas are perfect for kicking back and relaxing, and the large kitchen with its impressive Aga range is just waiting for your culinary creativity. The generously sized primary bedroom with its own bathroom shares the same level as the other two well-sized bedrooms and an additional second full bath, making it a highly sought after floorplan. You'll also enjoy the perks of a 2-car garage with washer and dryer hook-ups, additional storage space, and access to plenty of greenspace. With bay views and a scenic outlook over Glen Canyon Park, this corner lot location is a real gem promising a lot of upside. Located within blocks you can find numerous outdoor parks including Glen Canyon Park, Walter Haas Playground, and Billy Goat Hill. Not to mention, the convenience of shopping and restaurants in Glen Park and Diamond Heights Villages. Commuters will also love being within close proximity to The Glen Park Bart station.

Public Remarks: Modern and luxurious home in the highly sought-after Glen Park neighborhood! This stunning residence spans 3 levels, encompassing 2,134 SQFT with 4BD/2.5BA. It has undergone a complete renovation, resulting in an awesome transformation. Behind its contemporary facade, you'll discover beautiful white oak hardwood floors, & an abundance of natural light that permeates the home's open and airy layout. Additionally, there is a half bath & a deck, perfect for outdoor relaxation. The lower level with a separate entrance provides 2BD/1BA. It includes a family room w/wet bar & an office w/French doors to patio & low maintenance backyard. Easy freeway access & near Glen Park Bart station, Silicon Valley shuttle buses, restaurants, markets, and schools. Must see this truly remarkable home.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming 3BD/2BA Victorian nestled on a serene street at the coveted intersection of Glen Park and St Mary's Park, just blocks from Glen Park shopping, dining and BART, and close to Noe Valley, Bernal and Mission amenities. 12 Marsily Street greets visitors with a bright formal living room with warm period details, Roman columns, and freshly refinished hardwood floors, while an adjoining formal dining room and a roomy kitchen with dedicated breakfast area are ready for friends and fun. A bonus bedroom/home office with a private balcony, stairs to the rear yard, and full bath with shower over tub, completes the main living level. Up the home's grand staircase are two ample beds including a larger primary bedroom tucked quietly at the home's rear with views of the rear year, and a full bath in between. Fresh paint, refinished wood floors, and lots of configuration options run throughout this San Francisco Victorian classic. Out back is a large rear yard with room for pets and play, plus a laundry room in the basements, and lots of room for bikes, toys and storage under the home. Wonderful central location, true SF ambiance, and a neighborhood that shows pride of ownership and a sense of community, make 12 Marsily Street a must see!
Confidential Remarks: As-is Trust Sale. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This spacious light filled home offers two bedrooms and one split bath up, large formal living and dining rooms, remodeled kitchen and a suite of bonus rooms and full bath down. The expansive living room with lovely arched windows, beautiful wood floors, a statement fireplace and gum wood trim span the front of the home. Beyond the living room is the spacious formal dining room and adjacent kitchen with breakfast bar and pantry. At the rear of the home are two generous bedrooms with large closets and a period tiled split bath. The home sits on a spacious and desirable street to street lot. The ground level has a bonus suite of rooms and full bath with direct access from the yard, upper level and street. There is laundry area, parking, and abundant storage on the ground level as well. The yard has raised planters and plenty of opportunity to be an urban farmer! This striking Spanish Mediterranean home is situated in Mission Terrace with nearby Balboa Park, near all Glen Park Village amenities including Bart, Canyon Market, several coffee shops, restaurants, a bakery, other assorted small businesses, a library, public transportation, 280/101 North and South and the stunning Glen Park Canyon Park and Recreation Area.
Confidential Remarks: Offers to be submitted on Monday 12/19/2022 @ 12 Noon. The suite of rooms down may have been added without benefit of permit and are not warranted by seller or their agents. Buyer to investigate if this is a concern.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This Mission Terrace two-bedroom home exudes charm and Mediterranean elegance. It is the first time it has been on the market since the 1930's. It is a time capsule of well maintained fixtures and finishes. From the refinished original hardwood floors, the arched doorways, the living room picture windows, coved ceiling, pristine original light fixtures, the facade, and tiled exterior stairs, the home revels in classic Mediterranean finishes. The living room captures excellent light with the large windows. It has a handsome wood-burning fireplace, detailed tilework, and an arched shelf. The space will glow in the evenings with the golden-hued sconces. There is a formal dining room with impressive double wood doors and original pendant light. The kitchen has an additional room perfect for a home office with a classic built-in. The bathroom has a separate stall shower and tub. This property is expansion ready with the massive three-car garage below. The neighborhood is a treasure with a parklet at the end of the block with easy I-280 freeway access, minutes away from Glen Park BART, shops, and cafes. There is a sweet mini park at the end of the block of Cayuga and Lamartine.
Confidential Remarks: *Offer is accepted. Waiting on deposit.* The sellers own the vacant lot next door and can sell it with the home together. Lot MLS #423743879 This is a trust sale. All proceeds to benefit a non-profit, CPMC Foundation to support Child-life in-patient care. Disclosures I.O. Link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/72-Lamartine-Street-002plxj4 . We will set an offer date. I will post on the MLS soon. Full disclosures will be ready in a day. The majority of the package is posted now. Offers will be reviewed Wednesday, June 14th at noon.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A Fantastic Bernal Heights property with three stories, three bedrooms, two and a quarter bath. It offers a specious living room with fireplace, formal dining room with build-in China cabinets, a brand new remodeled granite kitchen with stainless steel new stove, kitchen fan, dishwasher and refrigerator. There is a lovely breakfast room and a large bedroom with bath that completes the main level. Two large bedrooms with full updated bath room at the top level. There are additional three bonus rooms and a bathroom downstairs that adds versatility and comfort of this home, whether for use as extra bedrooms, a home office, a gym, or even a guest suite. New light fixtures and beautiful hardwood floor throughout this lovely home. The large rear garden is undoubtedly a desirable feature, providing outdoor space for relaxation, gardening, or entertaining. And with three parking spaces (two indoor and one at the driveway), parking won't be a concern in this bustling neighborhood. This remodeled home appears to offer a wonderful combination of space, functionality, and outdoor amenities, with its combination of modern updates and cozy features. Great location close to Glen Park, BART, St Mary's recreation and Holly Park. This home is an excellent choice for comfort and style

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Meticulously rebuilt by Modern Art Construction, this residence embodies sophistication and premium craftsmanship, tailored for the most discerning buyers. Spanning 3 levels, this home features 4 bedrooms, a formal office, 3.5 baths, plus an elegant primary suite. The thoughtfully designed layout includes a media room, great room, a living room, a dining area, & powder room, providing ample space for relaxation and entertainment. Entertain in style in the chef's dream kitchen, equipped with a full set of Thermador appliances, a sprawling 10'4 granite island, and a 9' peninsula with a prep sink. The adjacent dining area seamlessly transitions to outdoor living spaces, perfect for al fresco dining and gatherings. Step outside to your own private retreat, featuring two stunning outdoor spaces complete with a recessed plunge bath,7 person hot tub, & sauna. Custom built outdoor kitchen, accessed through elegant mahogany doors, creates an unparalleled indoor/outdoor living experience. Additional amenities boast a 2car garage with EV charger, 800-bottle wine cellar, radiant heating, built-in ceiling speakers,WiFi enabled black out shades bedrooms. Lutron Caseta Smart Lighting.Floor plan shows 3426 SQFT excluding garage & utility room, buyer to verify SQFT to their satisfaction.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Bring your contractor and your imagination to this diamond in the rough single family fixer with RH-2 zoning and downtown views in a stellar Fairmount Heights location along the border of Glen Park and Noe Valley. Originally built in 1907, this two bed, two bath Victorian style home is near the Upper Noe Valley Rec Center, tech shuttles, the J church muni light rail, Glen Park BART station, and access to I-280 freeway. The upper level features two bedrooms and one bathroom with an eat-in kitchen, downtown views from the front room, and a family room at the rear that opens to a sun-drenched yard. The lower level of the home is not connected with an interior staircase at this time and features one bathroom with several additional rooms and independent street access. There is also an attic space that can be accessed from the rear yard. Combine all the levels together for a larger single-family home? Finish out the lower space as an ADU? Add a garage? Regardless of how you finish the interior of 235 Randall for your needs, the home has location, location, location with a very walkable 89 walkscore, excellent transit score of 81 and very bikeable bike score of 73. Offers reviewed as received.
Confidential Remarks: The property is a fixer. Seller is realistic.

Remarks: Spectacular, semi-attached, and stately four bedroom, three bath view home with soaring ceilings, sensational outdoor space and located on the border of two special neighborhoods: Bernal Heights and Glen Park! The timeless facade is embraced by an intimate front yard with an elegant arched gate and mature landscaping setting the tenor of the home. An impressive, modern, and inviting entryway leads to an open floor plan featuring a living/dining area with fireplace, updated kitchen, gorgeous wood floors, a full bathroom, a large bedroom overlooking the garden/backyard all graced with plenty of natural light. The dramatic stairway leads to a huge master bedroom suite with a full bathroom, views to the west, and a private sun-drenched deck with views to the east. The lower level of the home features a flexible floorplan with two additional bedrooms, the third bathroom, wet bar, and an entertainment space that opens to the second deck and Zen-like backyard/garden offering the perfect combination for entertaining, gardening, or peaceful repose. The spacious garage offers plenty of storage space along with a separate door for access. A truly unique home with modern updates, Victorian accents, & located in a prime location near cafes, restaurants, shopping, parks, HWY 101/280 and more!

Confidential Remarks: Easy to show by appointment. Please contact Harry at 415-971-0608 by phone or text. See www.LaidleyViewHome.com
Public Remarks: Perched on the most coveted block of Glen Pk, this stunning mid-century home has been skillfully remodeled and expanded to take full advantage of its stellar location and panoramic views. Meticulous stewardship and innovative design has transformed this classic 50's dwelling into an architectural gem. The top level floor plan has been structurally opened to bring light into the core of the home with a dramatic stairwell beautifully articulated with fine ironwork railings, venetian plaster wall finishes, and pristine quarter-sawn oak flooring. Two bedrms and a full bath complete the top flr. The middle level provides a generous space for a master suite along with a connection to the garage and laundry. The lower level provides a comfortable flex space well-suited for work at home, for entertaining guests or as a 4th bedrm suite. All 3 levels boast dramatic panoramic views of San Francisco, the bay, and the surrounding skyline along with walls of glass & large walk-decks to enjoy the view. The home also includes both cosmetic and structural upgrades focused on the efficient use of space and energy. improvements include newer electrical and mechanical systems and roof mounted solar panels.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This 2-unit Glen Park village condo building offers a fully remodeled 2 BD, 2 BA mid-century home with a private sunny outdoor terrace, beautiful hardwood floors throughout the property, excellent natural light, and soaring ceiling heights; enjoy quintessential Glen Park outlooks via a wall of floor-to-ceiling windows from an open-concept living area and lofted primary bedroom/office combo above. A large Modern kitchen with new white quartz countertops; refinished custom cabinetry; Viking range w/ Miele vented hood; a large pantry with in-unit laundry. It also offers an entrance on Thor Ave., a separate entrance on Diamond St., a dedicated 2-car tandem parking space, and a secure storage room. Convenient access to Glen Park BART, light rail, local shopping, dining, and daily needs, plus Glen Canyon Park with hiking trails, open space, playground, and tennis courts.
Confidential Remarks: Please email MLTeam@compass.com for showing requests and questions. Property website with virtual tour, photos and floor plan available here: www.47Thor.com. There is no monthly dues. 47 and 49 Thor replenished the account on an as needed basis. $170/month HOA due is estimate based on 2022 expenses.
